decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01b, dated May 2013, received 27/08/13; 02b, dated May 2013, received 27/08/13; 03a, dated May 2013, received 27/08/13; 04, dated May 2013, received 12/07/13; 05b, dated May 2013, received 06/09/13; 06c, dated May 2013, received 20/09/13; 07c, dated May 2013, received 20/09/13; and Design and Access Statement, dated July 2013, received 12/07/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extension(s) hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as No. 76A Upper Sutton Lane, Hounslow, TW5 0PT.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension and new front porch
